forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 65. West southwest wind 9 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
The morning in Downtown San Francisco unfurls beneath a bright blue sky, adorned by a few wispy clouds. The air carries a gentle touch of warmth, inviting the day’s exploration with a hint of summer’s embrace. With the sun illuminating the path ahead, one can expect comfortable temperatures peaking around 65 degrees as the west-southwest winds whisper softly, ruffling leaves while occasionally gusting to give a playful nudge. The delightful clarity of the day allows for picturesque views that stretch across the horizon, although a thick marine layer remains concealed just beyond the Golden Gate, quietly hovering, reminding us its presence is never far.

As evening approaches, the warmth will transition gently, settling to a serene low of 53 degrees. Whether strolling along the waterfront or sipping coffee al fresco, a light jacket will provide solace against the cooler breezes that drift through the city streets. One might consider meandering through the quieter corners of the parks or perhaps indulging in a cozy nook of a local café, watching the world dance by as dusk begins its tapestry in shades of orange and purple. It is a day that beckons with the promise of exploration and the simple pleasures that only a sunny San Francisco day can offer.
